fields.Title: <span style="font-size:12pt;">The Future Starts Today, Not Tomorrow</span><span style="font-size:12pt;"></span><span style="font-size:medium;"></span>
fields.Author/Editor of Larger Work: Stephanie A. Martin with Monica C. Church and Madeline Patterson
fields.Description/Abstract: This is a book that the French Church Institute self published as part of the commemoration of the late Senators 100th birthday. It is a book of speeches that have been edited and annotated for use in Idaho classrooms by English, history, and government teachers. The speeches were mostly found in the Frank Church papers found in the Boise State archives.
